title.rendered: Player Unknown’s Battlegrounds Steam Region Free | Account Only

excerpt.rendered:
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us by WhatsApp or Write to us at: support@codesforever.com

Note:- Product will be delivered By Emil & Whatsapp within 24Hrs of purchase.

  • Its is Digital Download which means Activation Code and Download link sent to via Email Only.
  • No CD/DVD/USB has been physically shipped to you
  • ATTENTION! After payment you will Get.login and password for steam account, on who was activated the game PLAYERUNKNOWN´S BATTLEGROUNDS.What you need to start playing:
  • User name and password will be random. And Cannot be change or altered.1. You need to download and install Steam http://steampowered.com/about (if not already installed)
    2. Sign in to your account using the purchased login and password.
    3. In the box at the top to find the Steam Library tab, click on her arm – you can see the entire list of games on the activated your account (in this case the game PLAYERUNKNOWN´S BATTLEGROUNDS). By title game clicking mouse->download/install. After installing the game, you can start playing.Note: This account have only one activation – the PLAYERUNKNOWN´S BATTLEGROUNDS game, other games on the account no. Account do not have statistics (ie already played hours in game).
